<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bat Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=3552) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 59</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Vampire Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3545)

</column>

---

You can transform into a bat. You gain the effects of a 4th-level [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) spell. At 14th level, you can choose to spend two actions instead of one to gain the effects of a 4th- or 5th-level _aerial form_ spell instead (bat form only).
name: Bat Form
